StringLiteralExpr.value: The image size must be greater than 5 x 5 pixels.
The number of spots in the image must be greater zero.
The noise standard deviation must be positive.
The mean spot intensity must be positive.
The spot intensity standard deviation must be positive.
The mean spot width must be positive.
The standard deviation in spot width must be positive.
Input spot position matrix must be N x 2 with N>0.
Spot positions and image dimensions do not match.
